content.rendered:
• Frequently Asked Questions
  • Go to La Verne Portal

Technology For Students

  • Student Account Setup: Getting student accounts such as email, Blackboard, and La Verne Portal; requesting Internet access in the residence halls…
  • Services for Students: Connecting to the Internet; changing passwords; available Google apps through your student Gmail account; online technology training opportunities; computer lab info;

Technology For Faculty and Staff

  • Faculty & Staff Account Setup: Getting accounts; connecting to the university network…
  • Services for Faculty & Staff: Reporting technology problems; Smart classroom info; wireless internet access; training opportunities; Hardware and software deals; requesting a Banner account; requesting a BiTech account
